Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Arizona in 2013...
Injured on 4/11/2013 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/2014 with a Spasms Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/4/2016, off Walter Johnson Jr. (DET)...
Earned first career win on 7/1/2016...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (N) on 9/17/2016...
Traded from Arizona to San Diego on 4/1/2017 (Going to SDN: P J. Cano, P A. Carranza, P A. Conley. Going to ARI: 1B A. Beltran)...
Traded from San Diego to Arizona on 4/13/2017 (Going to SDN: P J. Cano. Going to ARI: P J. Cano)...
Injured on 4/19/2017 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/2018, off Wayne Rayl (STL)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Struck out 15 batters against Cleveland on 7/22/2020...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 8/16/2020...
Struck out 19 batters against Washington on 7/3/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 2021, going 25-7, 2.63 ERA...
Struck out 15 batters against Los Angeles (N) on 6/10/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Struck out 16 batters against Milwaukee on 9/27/2022...
